Position, , Radiation therapist, Weekly working hours, , 36 hours fulltime, parttime working is also possible, , , , At Maastro, radiation therapists work in one of four multidisciplinary teams that consists of radiation therapists, radiation oncologists and medical physicists Currently we have around 80 radiation therapists At Maastro each radiation therapist covers all aspects of radiation treatment not only do you design, plan and administer radiation treatment, also imaging is an integral part of the job Participation in innovation and optimization projects is something that we encourage and offer possibilities for, , A typical day for a radiation therapist starts off with the teams daily scrum, maybe followed by half a day working on the design of a treatment plan and the rest of the day working on the linac, or a project meeting and a couple of hours on the CT machine, , Who are we looking for, , We are looking for committed and ambitious colleagues with a completed bachelor in radiation therapy Excellent communication skills and flexibility are important competences Also, it is important that you feel happy working in a very dynamic and innovative organization Since the profession of radiation therapist is a regulated profession in the Netherlands, a credential evaluation of the foreign diploma must first take place before you can get started This can take up to max 4 months There are also requirements for Dutch language proficiency And of course, you will need a residence  work permit to work in The Netherlands Our HR department will assist on all these matters They are happy to inform you about the possibilities If you have any questions on these topics, please contact Ellen Dekkers, sr HR advisor, via email or by calling See also the following informative website, , Employment conditions, , Our employment conditions are based on the Dutch Collective Labour Agreement for Hospitals You will start with a contract for one year but with the intention to make this permanent The salary for this position is a maximum of  3490,  5663, AUD gross per month, on a fulltime basis 36 hours a week Working parttime is also possible Additionally, we offer an extensive package of secondary employment conditions, including an 833 holiday allowance, an 833 endofyear bonus and an excellent pension provision Candidates from abroad may qualify for the advantageous 30 tax rule and a reimbursement of relocation expenses conditions apply, , Working at Maastricht en in the SouthLimburg region of The Netherlands, , Maastro is an internationally acclaimed institute for stateoftheart radiotherapy, situated in Maastricht, The Netherlands We provide radiation therapy to patients in southeastern part of The Netherlands, aiming to cure patients while preventing side effects of the treatment Maastro has advanced equipment such as 6 Varian TrueBeams with kV and MV imaging capability, two dual energy CT scanners, a PETCT scanner and a Mevion proton therapy system with pencil beam scanning Maastro also offers an extensive brachytherapy program, , We have wellestablished research groups and we work in close collaboration with Maastricht University Research School GROW and Maastricht University Hospital MUMC in the fields of education, clinical and preclinical research, , Living and working in the SouthLimburg region of The Netherlands  SouthLimburg equals quality of life and a burgundian lifestyle Plenty of career opportunities with at least 1,250 HBO  academic vacancies within one hour travel time, beautiful landscapes, interspersed with urban areas, the unique position on the interface of Latin and Germanic cultures and the rich cultural offerings in and around the area Due to the unique location so near to both Belgium and Germany, cities such as Lige, Aachen and Cologne are just around the corner And if you want to go to the big city, Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Utrecht, The Hague, Eindhoven, Antwerp and Brussels can be reached in less then two hours Europe is at your feet Maastro is within cycling distance of the historic city center of Maastricht and the surrounding villages Choose to live a little further away The Maastricht Randwyck train station is almost on our doorstep, , More information, , Working at Maastro we strive for people who are intrinsically motivated to get the best out of themselves to realize the strategic goals of Maastro To support this, we offer excellent primary and secondary employment conditions, in accordance with the Collective Labor Agreement for Hospitals in Dutch CAO Ziekenhuizen This includes for example a competitive salary, excellent working conditions, good pension arrangements and discount schemes with regard to sports, bicycles and various collective insurances But even more important we invest in development of people and as such offer a wide range of options for personal development  from international ESTRO courses to mindfulnesscourses We invest in the employability and vitality of our employees keeping all our employees healthy and motivated, whatever stage of life they are in, , To get an idea of the Maastro workforce, a few key figures at a glance, , , More information on this position, , Martien van Bussel or Huub Backes

Company Description, , Eurofins Scientific is an international life sciences company which performs more than 400 million tests each year within its 800 laboratories across over 50 countries with more than 48000 staff expected 5 billion Euros revenue in 2020, , As a world leader in the provision of clinical diagnostics, forensic, pharmaceutical, food and environmental laboratory testing services, Eurofins has been able to draw on its scientific experience to develop a range of SARSCoV2 tests in response to the Coronavirus pandemic, , The Eurofins SAFERWORK programme is designed to help companies set up advanced risk management protocols and contributes to limiting the impact of COVID19 in the workplace Eurofins SAFERWORK program combines workplace surfaces and wastewater testing together with riskbased clinical testing, as well as relevant consultative, audit, and assurance services to assess and focus on areas where virus presence is likelier This approach reduces cost and supports health authorities to allocate capacity constrained human COVID19 testing where it is most needed, , , , Within its SaferWork division, Eurofins is looking for experienced sales executives to support the growth of our COVID19 customer base with governments, airports, sport leagues, etc, , The Sales Executive will develop and manage customers as well as ensure a planned approach to Customer Relationship Management in terms of identifying and strengthening revenue, relationship building and ensuring customer retention and customer visits The successful candidate will generate profitable new business and exceed new business targets in line with business plans, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Additional Information

Job Description: Taakomschrijving, , TheOTCLab is a Dutch company based in downtown Amsterdam At TheOTCLab, we focus on developing effective, nontoxic medical devices for everyday health issues Why Because we are passionate about giving people, worldwide, access to natural, easytouse and safe treatment solutions, , As of 1 September 2020, we are looking for a intern Are you good in communication, digital minded and have a CAN DO mentality Do you find it a great challenge to work in a small team and do you want to get to know all facets in the field of communication within an international market Then we are looking for you We are looking for an expert that can drive our strategic brand plans, has a handson approach, and possesses the ability to work with an international team, , , , , , , , A varied internship where you come into contact with the various work fields of International Communication In the internship you have contact with all divisions within the company eg Marketing and Sales In addition, this internship is of course the perfect opportunity to participate in a small team where you can see all ins and outs of a fastgrowing company During the period you work 5 days a week at the head office and you receive excellent guidance This work placement offers the possibility for a graduation assignment for 1 day a week, , , , , , Albert Swane infotheotclabcom, , or, , TheOTCLab, Fred Roeskestraat 115 1076 EE Amsterdam, , Wil je graag meer zien Log in of schrijf je in, Nu solliciteren

Industry: ['Marketing and Advertising', 'Information Technology and Services', 'Computer Software']
Job Description: Join one of the international leading labs in Delft, the Netherlands as an intern What will you be doing Riscure is an ambitious organization specializing in embedded security testing from the semiconductor, payment, Pay TV, mobile and automotive industry In addition, Riscure is the leading vendor of specialist security testing products Our main office in the Netherlands has been around since 2001, but we have satellite offices in San Francisco, California and Shanghai, China We have engaging projects and a constructive work environment based on knowledge sharing We are looking for selfmotivated individuals who would like to embrace the opportunity to drive security forward in our growing company You will work closely with the team, gain experience and actively contribute to different core processes and attacks Some examples of the activities in practice are programming, fault injection, experimentation with hardware designs, reporting, eating in the Riscure canteen You will have an opportunity to learn about fault injection and hardware security Are you the person with a focus on problemsolving, ready to work in our young, open and transparent work environment with ample room for fresh ideas What does a day at Riscure look like We evaluate the security of products that use embedded and smart card technologies The main activities of the evaluation process include analyzing threats and weaknesses by taking apart a devices specifications, code or hardware, and then developing the necessary tools to attack the security As part of the mission statement of the company driving security forward, Riscure believes that knowledge sharing is key to innovation and evolution of employees Time is arranged for personal development and for weekly sharing knowledge events that are organized for everyone to join In addition to evaluation work, we carry out other projects, including consultancy work, research, tool development, and training As a stateoftheart lab, our internal research and development process is a necessity to remain competitive We record the knowledge we gain during our projects in the Riscure knowledge database to ensure it is preserved and shared within Riscure Job role description

Industry: ['Marketing and Advertising', 'Information Technology and Services', 'Computer Software']
Job Description: This vacancy is open in our HQ in Delft, The Netherlands Do you like analyzing complex security issues Riscure is a young, ambitious organization specializing in embedded security testing for leading international clients from the semiconductor, payment, Pay TV, mobile, and smart metering industry In addition, Riscure is the leading vendor of specialist security testing products We have 60 employees with mixed technical and academic backgrounds working from offices in Delft, The Netherlands and San Francisco, USA Riscure is organized in three units Security Lab, Inspector, and Riscure North America We are looking for Experienced Security Analysts who like to use a variety of techniques for instance source code review, software reverse engineering and exploitation to discover a products fraud risk profile in order to improve its security The position is mainly for Mobile security assessments in the payment market, but hardware projects, or any other type of project may come your way if you are up for it Do you get excited over software reversing Or how about analyzing a Trusted Applications Does the prospect of using libFuzzer or AFL on a Trusted Application give you goosebumps Do you call IDA Pro or radare2 your friends Do you dream in hex Even more reasons to come aboard What does a day at Riscure look like We evaluate the security of products that use embedded, smart card, and mobile technologies usually in teams of 24 security analysts The main activities of the evaluation process include analysing threats and weaknesses by taking apart a devices specifications, code or hardware, and then developing the necessary tools to attack the security Results of this go into a report, and we give recommendations for solving these problems In addition to evaluation work we carry out other projects, including consultancy work, research, tool development, and training As a stateoftheart lab, our internal research and development process is a necessity to remain competitive We record the knowledge we gain during our projects to ensure it is preserved and shared within Riscure We mainly work at our office in Delft Parts of a project may require working at the customers premises Depending on the type of assignment and your level of experience you are in regular contact with a customers technical liaison during a project All communications with our customers are in English What skills should I have to be able to join You have successfully completed an academic course in Information Technology or Electrical Engineering You have 1 to 5 years work experience You have a good understanding of the following
